Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City charter in relation to allowing non-citizens who are lawfully present in the United States, and who are residents of New York City, to vote in all New York City municipal elections, and to renumber Sections 1057-A, 1058, 1059, 1060, 1061, 1062, 1063, 1064, 1065, 1066, 1067, 1068, 1069, 1070, 1071, 1072, 1073 and 1074 as 1058, 1080, 1081, 1082, 1083, 1084, 1085, 1086, 1087, 1088, 1089, 1090, 1091, 1092, 1093, 1094, 1095 and 1096, respectively.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing non-citizens who are lawfully present in the US, and who are residents of NYC, to vote in all NYC municipal elections.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City charter in relation to allowing non-citizens who are lawfully present in the United States, and who are residents of New York City, to vote in all New York City municipal elections, and to renumber Sections 1057-A, 1058, 1059, 1060, 1061, 1062, 1063, 1064, 1065, 1066, 1067, 1068, 1069, 1070, 1071, 1072, 1073 and 1074 as 1058, 1080, 1081, 1082, 1083, 1084, 1085, 1086, 1087, 1088, 1089, 1090, 1091, 1092, 1093, 1094, 1095 and 1096, respectively.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing non-citizens who are lawfully present in the US, and who are residents of NYC, to vote in all NYC municipal elections.
